akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 111–203, title VI, § 604(c)(2), July 21, 2010, 124 Stat. 1601

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1848a. Repealed. Pub. L. 111–203, title VI, § 604(c)(2), July 21, 2010, 124 Stat. 1601
Section, act May 9, 1956, ch. 240, § 10A, as added Pub. L. 106–102, title I, § 113, Nov. 12, 1999, 113 Stat. 1368, related to limitation on rulemaking, prudential, supervisory, and enforcement authority of the Board.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective Date of RepealRepeal effective on the transfer date, see section 604(j) of Pub. L. 111–203, set out as an Effective Date of 2010 Amendment note under section 1462 of this title.
